/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryPlanMapper.selectHcDeliveryPlanSubList] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , A.STOCK_ID , A.STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = A.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = A.STOCK_CODE) AS STOCK_NAME , A.SUPLY_ITEM_CD , A.PO_QTY , A.CONFIRM_QTY , A.UOM , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '42' AND CODE_ID = A.UOM) AS UOM_NAME , NVL(B.EX_PLAN_QTY, 0) AS EX_PLAN_QTY , NVL(B.PRODUCED_QTY, 0) AS PRODUCED_QTY , NVL(A.CONFIRM_QTY, 0) - NVL(B.PRODUCED_QTY, 0) AS BALANCE_QTY
, 0 AS PLAN_QTY , ( SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_DATE(MAX(CDC_DUE_DT), 'YYYYMMDD'), SYSDATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS PLAN_DT FROM HMC0004M Z WHERE Z.PO_NO = #{sPoNo} ) AS PLAN_DT FROM HMC0005D A , ( SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , SUM(PO_PLAN_QTY) AS EX_PLAN_QTY , SUM(ACTUAL_QTY) AS PRODUCED_QTY FROM HMC0006D WHERE PO_NO = #{sPoNo} GROUP BY PO_NO, PO_DTL_NO ) B WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.PO_NO = #{sPoNo} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PO_NO, A.PO_DTL_NO

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryPlanMapper.selectHcDeliveryPlanPlan] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , A.PO_DTL_PLAN_NO , B.STOCK_ID , B.STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = B.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = B.STOCK_CODE) as STOCK_NAME , A.PO_PLAN_QTY , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PO_PLAN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS PO_PLAN_DT , A.ACTUAL_QTY , B.CONFIRM_QTY FROM HMC0006D A -- PLAN , HMC0005D B -- PO DETAIL WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PO_NO = #{sPoNo} ORDER BY A.PO_NO, A.PO_DTL_NO, A.PO_DTL_PLAN_NO

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryPlanMapper.selectHcDeliveryPlanPlanCnt] - KR JIN */ SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM HMC0006D A -- PLAN , HMC0005D B -- PO DETAIL WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PO_NO = #{sPoNo}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryPlanMapper.selectPlanCompare] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , NVL(MAX(A.CONFIRM_QTY), 0) - NVL(SUM(B.ACTUAL_QTY), 0) AS DIFFERENT FROM HMC0005D A -- PO DETAIL , HMC0006D B -- PLAN WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.PO_NO = #{poNo} GROUP BY A.PO_NO, A.PO_DTL_NO
